trans-unit.source: Hermes server is offline, please turn the station on.
to access admin features, put your username and password
Are you sure you wanna delete
Are you sure you wanna update
select who can attach files to messages:
send your public message to another station
Your message was sent to the transmission list
There was an error to send your message
Are you sure you wanna change radio settings? this may cause the system to stop
Are you sure you want to reset the radio to the default configuration?
Are you sure you want to shut down Hermes system? This will stop messages transmission and reception.
Are you sure you want to reboot Hermes system? This will stop messages transmission and reception.
Are you sure you wanna restore the factory system? this will delete all users, emails and messages !!!
Please type your password again to confirm factory restore:
